column2: ggplot(data=my_data, aes(y= audience_score, x=genre, fill=genre ) ) + geom_boxplot() + ggtitle("Audience Score vs Genre") +  xlab("Genre") + ylab("Audience Score") + scale_fill_manual(values = c("#846B87", "#9c869f", "#b585a5", "#d281a1", "#ec7e94", "#ff7f7e", "#ff8562", "#ff933f", "#ffa600", "#ffc375", "#fbe1c7")) + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 60, hjust = 1))
